== Introduction ==
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Ubuntu Edition Francophone (Ubuntu French Remix) simply provides a desktop CD that includes all French language packs from main to allow the user a better localized Ubuntu experience without downloading anything from the internet. There is just one addition : the "simplecommeubuntu" package, which gives access to a PDF User Guidebook (written in French by Canonical employee D.Roche) from the desktop.
| {{https://librarian.launchpad.net/5622193/ubuntu-tux_150px.png}}
|}
